This is a bitter post to announce, but we are discontinuing Mist. You can read the full post here but for your convenience I will try to summarize in a few tweets: https://medium.com/@avsa/sunsetting-mist-da21c8e943d2 …

There are mainly two reasons a good and a bad one: ecosystem and security

They're testing the functional Ethereum 2.0 state transition components, with parallelization.
